transcript: when we die I'll probably be equally satisfied and dissatisfied as I am today I've accomplished things that I said would make me happy years ago I had this Mentor early on I had a particularly good weekend and I came in a little bit upbeat I told her that and she said pretty sure that's the secret to living a good life is putting as many of those days in a row as you can it operationalized joy for me just like okay doing things that I like with people that I like as many times in a row as I can
